role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Ruby (as well as a configurable list of system or user level gems) on almost any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Ruby](https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/) is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language. It was designed and developed in the mid-1990s by Yukihiro "Matz" Matsumoto in Japan. Ruby is dynamically typed and uses garbage collection.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Ruby (as well as a configurable list of system or user level gems) on almost any platform.
